Upload.MsgErrorManyFileSelected: You can select a maximum of ${maxFileCount} files.
Upload.MsgErrorFileSize: The file ${files[i].name} exceeds the maximum size allowed.
Upload.MsgErrorTotalFilesSize: The total size of the selected files exceeds the allowed limit.
Upload.MsgErrorFileType: The file type of file ${files[i].name} is not allowed.
Upload.MsgErrorOnUpload: An error occurred when uploading the files.

Grid.MsgErrorCellNoneValue: The value in column %s was not accepted, please enter a valid value and try again
Grid.MsgErrorCellValue: The value "%s" was not accepted in column %s, please enter a valid value and try again

Error500.Title: CONNECTION LOST
Error500.Text: The connection to the server has been lost and will automatically come back once you are online with the server again

Messages.SessionIdleTimeOut: Your session will soon be terminated due to inactivity

Error429.Title: Too Many Connections
Error429.Text1: You have exceeded the connections limit. Please wait
Error429.Text2: seconds and we will try to connect again.

ErrorBlacklist.Title: IP Blocked
ErrorBlacklist.SubTitle2: is currently on the blacklist. If you believe this is an error, you can request a delist by entering your IP address below.
ErrorBlacklist.MsgTimeOut: The session has expired. Click OK to refresh the page and try again.
ErrorBlacklist.MsgWrongIP: IP address appears to be wrong
ErrorBlacklist.MsgDelistSuccess: Delist request for IP ${ipAddress} was successful. Reloading...
ErrorBlacklist.MsgDelistFailed: Failed to process delist request for IP ${ipAddress}. Please try again later.
ErrorBlacklist.MsgDelistError: An error occurred while processing your request. Please try again later.
ErrorBlacklist.MsgInvalidIp: Invalid IP address. Please check and try again.
